meanings.definition: To decorate with jewels or precious stones.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys bejeweling her dresses for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The queen's crown was bejeweled with diamonds and rubies.
meanings.sent3: The cat surprised everyone by bejeweling its collar with shiny beads.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was bejeweled with twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The artist spent hours bejeweling the statue with colorful gemstones.

meanings.definition: The act of adorning with jewels or precious stones.
meanings.sent1: The bejeweling of the royal necklace was a meticulous task.
meanings.sent2: She admired the bejeweling on the antique brooch.
meanings.sent3: The bejeweling on the cake made it look like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent4: The bejeweling of the costume added a touch of glamour to the performance.
meanings.sent5: The bejeweling of the tiara sparkled under the lights.
